name: Audiodraft, Inc.
description: Developer of an online audio branding platform designed to outsource audio productions to a network of musicians and sound designers. The company's platform offers custom-made music and sound design for television commercials, theme music for mobile games, and audio logos for companies, enabling clients to create open sound design contests, where sound designers compete and audio content can be bought for various media use.
one_liner: Developer of an online audio branding platform designed to outsource audio productions to a network of musicians and sound designers. The company's platform offers custom-made music and sound design for television commercials, theme music for mobile games, and audio logos for companies, enabling clients to create open sound design contests, where sound designers compete and audio content can be bought for various media use.
